titleStmt.title: The history of Christ's sufferings composed out of the prophets, evangelists, apostles, fathers, and other holy writers. With aspirations, or prayers, suitable to each section. In order to an entire resignation of the soul to the will of God, according to the example of Christ by Dudley Garenciers, rector of Waverton, near Chester.
titleStmt.author: Garencieres, Dudley, d. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Lowndes, over against Exeter-Exchange in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Title page = A2. The first and the last leaves are blank.
Imperfect: copy lacks signatures T and leaf V1, pages 273-290.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
